it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.plugs

Class LightSensor.Rgb

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unive.dais.legodroid.lib.plugs.LightSensor.Rgb
  • Enclosing class:
    LightSensor

    public static class LightSensor.Rgb
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a raw RGB color value via a triple of integers.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int B 
      int G 
      int R 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rgb(int R, int G, int B)
      Create an object given the 3 integer values for each color component.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int toARGB32()
      Calculate the ARGB 32-bit color value (four 8-bit components, including alpha channel).
      int toRGB24()
      Calculate the RGB 24-bit color value (8 bits for each component).

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rgb

        public Rgb(int R,
           int G,
           int B)
        Create an object given the 3 integer values for each color component.
        Parameters:
        R - 8-bit red component in range [ 0 - 255 ]
        G - 8-bit red component in range [ 0 - 255 ]
        B - 8-bit red component in range [ 0 - 255 ]

    • Method Detail

      • toRGB24

        public int toRGB24()
        Calculate the RGB 24-bit color value (8 bits for each component).
        Returns:
        the RGB24 value as an integer.

      • toARGB32

        public int toARGB32()
        Calculate the ARGB 32-bit color value (four 8-bit components, including alpha channel). Alpha channel defaults to 255 for maximum opaqueness.
        Returns:
        the ARGB32 value as an integer.
